text:
The March Holiday special pod! In this episode we cover the 1 yr anniversary of 3/11, the many layered meanings of #StPatricksDay and the #NCAATournament #MarchMadness plus I go through all the stages of my #vaccine #vaccination experience 
#COVID19 #CovidVaccine #StPattysDay https://t.co/ug3Fh13mSp
